MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Cilcain and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the overhead line fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:53AM on 31st October 2020
